thread.title: Imelda Staunton is amongst the winners at the UK Theatre Awards 2015 - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Imelda Staunton is amongst the winners at the UK Theatre Awards 2015 - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Imelda Staunton is amongst the winners at the UK Theatre Awards 2015 - Showbiz
text: Imelda Staunton has been named one of the winners at the UK Theatre Awards 2015.The actress won the award for best performance for her role in Gypsy, which also received the award for best musical production. © Johan Perrson Gypsy review: Imelda Staunton is ridiculously brilliant The musical tells the story of striptease artist Gypsy Rose Lee and features music by Jule Styne and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim.Elsewhere, Upstairs Downstairs co-creator Dame Eileen Atkins received the Gielgud Award in recognition of her outstanding contribution to the dramatic arts.The award for best performance in a play was shared by Abigail's Party actress Polly Lister and Each His Own Wilderness actor Joel MacCormack. © Johan Persson The awards were presented at London's Guildhall yesterday (October 17).A full list of winners is available here.
